Concord.Northwest Cabarrus High School:
Northwest Cabarrus High School, commonly referred to simply as Northwest and abbreviated as NCHS, is a comprehensive public high school located in Kannapolis, North Carolina, USA. The school is a part of the Cabarrus County Schools system.
It opened in 1966, merging the former high schools in the Odell and Winecoff communities.


== Academics ==
Northwest's academic coursework falls in line with the North Carolina Standard Course of Study in all core subject areas.
